name: checkcle
description: Checkcle is a real-time monitoring dashboard that tracks hardware resource usage such as CPU, memory, and disk across multiple machines. Self-hosted with a clean and minimal UI for sysadmins and home labbers.
features: Resource Monitoring: Track CPU, memory, and disk across machines. Complete visibility.
Real-Time Dashboard: Live updates of hardware usage. Instant insights.
Multi-Server: Monitor multiple machines from one interface. Centralized monitoring.
Clean UI: Minimal, focused interface for sysadmins. No clutter.
Home Lab Ready: Perfect for home servers and labs. Enthusiast-friendly.
Self-Hosted: Run your own monitoring infrastructure. Complete control.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient monitoring. Fast performance.
